attributes.action: explain why tax payers should fund political elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the track record of this Government on the spending of tax payers money, why should tax payers fund political party's election costs? Tax payers' money is wasted already, this would be 'a bridge too far'!!
What do we have to show for the spending on Education, the NHS & Public Transport, over the past 10 years. Nothing!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
